website_summaries.verdict: These water barbells provide outstanding workout tools for aquatic physical therapy, hydrotherapy and pool fitness.
pros: Designed for elbow and shoulder flexion and extension
Only require 2.5-pounds of force to submerge the barbells
Sold in multiple resistance and buoyancy levels
Approved for use by fitness professionals
cons: White foam tends to dissolve over time
Barbell grips sometimes slide back and forth

customer_reviews.title: Always Wet!
customer_reviews.text: They work fine but the strange foam stuff absorbs water that will not shake off, so when I put them in the trunk of my car...everything gets wet...and it stays wet. The medium weight aggravates my shoulder pain but the light weight ones seem to be just right. I will not buy these again, instead I would rather go with the kind that are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Quality. Misshapen.
customer_reviews.text: Beware, these are not authentic. Foam rings are not perfectly round and they seem to have been recently hand-cut by a jigsaw. There are little pieces for foam flaking off each of the foam rings and Thera-Band (red) logo disks appear to also have been hand-cut and fabricated. I also own the Thera-Band Kickroller through a different supplier ( NOT Vesalius Health ) and the quality is distinctly superior. Please note I've never felt the need to post negative feedback, (or any at all) however, this is an inexcusable waste of my hard earned money. Please, don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: ConsciousBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With These
customer_reviews.text: These have just the right amount of resistance ( light resistance ) which is what I wanted because I have arthritis. My only complaint is that the bar is just wide enough for my hands and I have small hands. I use these for water aerobics or when I'm in our pool and want to get a bit of a work out especially for my arms. These seem to be made of good quality materials so they should last a very long time, but I don't leave them out in the sun when I'm not using them. The sun ruins everything. Very happy with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could exchange
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago to use for water aerobics. I injured my leg a few days later and they sat in the garage. I recently started water aerobics and after a few classes I noticed that one was wobbly and annoying while using. I looked closely at them and one has a longer middle piece and works good the other has a short middle piece and slides back and forth when I'm using. I wish I had noticed this sooner so I could return. Not good- too expensive to be like this
customer_reviews.author: Pattiryan

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much, I purchased a second set
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product so much that I bought a second set. The first set had been sitting out in the sun for several years and was starting to be a little less buoyant than I prefer. But at this price, I don't mind replacing them every few years. This set will be stored in the shade for a little more longevity. Would recommend to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: ArtzyLady

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to increase resistance in my pool exercise routine. They serve the purpose of adding resistance to certain necessary moves. However, I wish they provided more resistance. Would be great if someone could design a product that has the capability of increasing resistance over time. But, for it's limited use, I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: G Flores

customer_reviews.title: Not happy one is bigger than the other and where you ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy one is bigger than the other and where you hold it very annoying in the water because it slides up and down.. I just got to use them when my pool was opened last week so it's past return date and can't return
customer_reviews.author: Bernice D.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them twice but they are perfect for my aquatic physical therapy. I bought the red ones not being sure if they would be too light but they have the right amount of resistance for me. I love that they don’t hold water and they are air dry by the next day so I can pack them up in my pool bag. I am very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these bells!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue and I was shocked at the resistance! I'm 57 yrs old and just started pool exercises. I love them and would highly recommend. If you are not used to lifting heavy items then start with a smaller set. Very good hand grips too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: These are sxactly like I had hoped for, light in water. I have an injured shoulder and hand. PERFECTO MUÑDO!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F.

customer_reviews.title: RED: PERFECT FOR BEGINNER LEVEL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red hand bars which worked out perfectly for the stage that I am in at this time. I do believe though they are overpriced. I'll have to think of something else when I graduate to the next level. I will not be buying the green or blue ones.
customer_reviews.author: Half of Twosome

customer_reviews.title: Very we’ll made. Comfortable grips.
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were not going to be enough resistance but just turning your hands can change that. They have held up great with three people using almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna Connie

customer_reviews.title: High quality water weights
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my exercise routine. High quality foam barbells. Comes in three sizes. I have the light, which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very useful for exercise in the pool. I am recovering from rotator cuff surgery and these work great for most of the required exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: TheraBand Water Weights
customer_reviews.text: These TheraBand water weights are perfect for me! Lymphedema is something I am trying to always avoid after a pretty violent breast cancer. Since I can no longer lift regular dumbbells these are perfect weight and made very well!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Alabise

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Product had a cut in it. I’m paying for a non cut into product so sent it back for a replacement. Hope all goes well with return and shipping of a newer non damaged Thera-band weights for aquacize.
customer_reviews.author: Ellane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the red and the green ones to use in the therapy pool - I have used ones just like them owned by the pool and wanted my own set. They stand up well to use and are just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yandow

customer_reviews.title: Must use underwater to get any resistance
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would get "weighted down" once wet, and that is how you would get strength training in the pool. They weigh nothing and they float! So you have to work with them under the water to get any type of resistance exercise from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable water weights
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the lightest weight at all. It was like working out with nothing. I ordered the biggest, largest weight then. They provide a lot of resistance, but keep me a float in the deep water exercises. I'm thinking the green medium weight would be a better choice for most women.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Z

customer_reviews.title: More expense just not what we want
customer_reviews.text: We thought these weights would give good residents in the water but they were just to light. We returned the weights
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Use for personal Aqua aerobics. These do not start to absorb after or shred as some do as. They age. Good brand,
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thompson (public)

customer_reviews.title: MostUseful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for water exercise and body mechanics. Moved from the "gym rat status" to the "pool conditioning." Biy 5he complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are so much better than the hard plastic ones LA Fitness has
customer_reviews.text: these are so much better than the hard plastic ones LA Fitness has. they give a fair amount of resistance, and are light enough to carry back and forth to gym.
customer_reviews.author: auntiem54

customer_reviews.title: Great for water fitness
customer_reviews.text: Work great for water aerobics. Perfect size for workouts. Strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: shirley broderick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pool exercises! Light but in the water they provide the right amount of resistance. Easy to use. Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for aqua aerobics!
customer_reviews.text: Simplistic. Easy to use. Perfect for different levels of pool exercise. Recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Yard Youngun

customer_reviews.title: Kind of flimsy, need something a bit heavier, ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy, need something a bit heavier, but I exchanged the medium weight for these because I thought the medium was too heavy. Too late to exchange these, I have used these a few times, so I will give give them away.
customer_reviews.author: 10sgal

customer_reviews.title: not small enough
customer_reviews.text: this is the smallest weight, yet it is too big to fit small hands. Not as easy to use in the pool because it is too big for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: MixedMediaFour

customer_reviews.title: Great for water workouts!
customer_reviews.text: These weights are wonderful! I have been doing water workouts with these and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: sam spade

customer_reviews.title: Water weights!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do water aerobics a coupe times a week. Really like my own weights. Light and easy to carry back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: S. Komer

customer_reviews.title: great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find the same ones I have used in a water aerobics class. They were just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water weights
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot - wish I got more weight - will upgrade eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Beatlelady

customer_reviews.title: Is a wonderful product for water exercise
customer_reviews.text: Is a wonderful product for water exercise. They are good for upper body strength while in t he pool. great water resit in the pool. if you do water aerobics they str s great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Benedict

customer_reviews.title: These weights are just right.
customer_reviews.text: I like this size. The previous ones I was using were too small. These are a good "in between" size, and I was happy to find them again. I teach water aerobics and will order these for my students. Shipping was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: MelOA

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but much too light weight. Almost no resistance in water.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the red (least resistance) & love them. I have some medical issues with my neck, these give me a workout but don’t over strain my muscles.
customer_reviews.author: MKA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use in pool!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd set of these. After a few years in the sun the first set were starting to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Using every day I go in pool. A good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R.

customer_reviews.title: fun way to stay in shape
customer_reviews.text: Great item and fabulous price! Recommended by PT for core strengthening activity.
customer_reviews.author: Rubie Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the water weights. Used them in a water aerobics class and really felt like they helped with exercise.,,
customer_reviews.author: C. Pool

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right resistance for me when in the water
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Tsibulsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, great, no complaints, great product. If I need more I will order from you! 😁
customer_reviews.author: James Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but the paper on the end will come off.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Plachecki

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The picture says three but received just one....not fair I want to return also what I got is not worth even three dollars....not right I want a recund
customer_reviews.author: Roya parsay

product_meta.title: TheraBand Water Weights, Aquatic Dumbbells for Pool Fitness, 2 Foam Weights with Padded Grip for Water Aerobics, Therapy, Workouts, Pool Exercise Equipment, Aqua Training, Red, Light, Beginner
product_meta.description: Color:Light - RedTheraBand Hand Bars are a great tool for aquatic therapy and fitness. Increase range of motion in the upper and lower extremities, strengthen the lower back, abdominal muscles and obliques, and increase flexibility in the back. TheraBand Hand Bars are a great tool for aquatic fitness training and water aerobics exercises and come in progressive resistance levels based on your needs.
feature_bullets: Great tool for aquatic physical therapy, hydrotherapy, and pool fitness and to increase range of motion in the upper and lower extremities
Increase flexibility in the back and strengthen the lower back, abdominal muscles and obliques with exercises like water walking, rowing and push downs
Ideal for elbow and shoulder flexion and extension, 2.5 pounds of force needed to submerge
Fun accessory and water exercise equipment for aqua Zumba, water aerobics or general pool workout activities
Available in three resistance and buoyancy levels to match user need - Red, Light is 10" X 1", comes in a pair

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
